citations.narrative:
The licensee acquired two red foxes and has consigned the animals for sale. The licensee is not currently licensed to
conduct regulated activities with wild/exotic canids. Selling foxes is regulated activity. Failing to acquire the correct license
designations prior to obtaining restricted/dangerous animal species can result in animals being held by unauthorized and
or unqualified personnel. The licensee must obtain a new license that includes authorization for use of wild/exotic canids
prior to conducting regulated activity with any more animals of this type. Correct by 8/8/23.
This inspection was conducted with a representative and exit interview was conducted with the licensee.
This inspection was conducted in Madison, Florida.
Additional Inspectors:
Tracie Crawford, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

narrative:
2.1(b)(2)(ii) 
   
Requirements and application 
The licensee acquired two red foxes and has consigned the animals for sale. The licensee is not currently licensed to 
conduct regulated activities with wild/exotic canids. Selling foxes is regulated activity. Failing to acquire the correct license 
designations prior to obtaining restricted/dangerous animal species can result in animals being held by unauthorized and 
or unqualified personnel. The licensee must obtain a new license that includes authorization for use of wild/exotic canids 
prior to conducting regulated activity with any more animals of this type. Correct by 8/8/23. 
 
This inspection was conducted with a representative and exit interview was conducted with the licensee. 
This inspection was conducted in Madison, Florida. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
Tracie Crawford, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

species.common: RED FOX (INCLUDES SILVER FOX & CROSS FOX)
